about: Shivam Kumar is a Data Analyst and Python Developer based in Delhi, India. He specializes in building backend API frameworks, data analytics with Power BI, and cloud-native solutions. He's currently pursuing an Executive MBA from IIT Patna in Data Analytics & Data Science.

Shivam is a proactive Python Backend Developer with expertise in API development, cloud migration, and data analytics. He has strong skills in Power BI, SQL, Splunk, and Python, with a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions.

skills.general: Shivam has expertise in Data Analytics (Power BI, Splunk, SQL), Backend Development (Python, FastAPI), Cloud & DevOps (Azure, Docker), Frontend (React.js, HTML, CSS), and AI/ML (LLMs, GitHub Copilot). Which area would you like to know more about?
skills.python: Shivam is highly skilled in Python, including FastAPI for backend development, Pandas and NumPy for data analysis, and automation scripting. He uses Python daily for building API frameworks and data processing.
skills.powerbi: Shivam is a certified Power BI Data Analyst (PL-300). He creates interactive dashboards that transform raw data into insightful visual reports for monitoring KPIs and operational trends.
skills.azure: Shivam has Azure certifications (AZ-900, DP-900, AI-900) and experience migrating applications to cloud-native environments on Azure. He works with Docker, API Gateway, and Azure services.
skills.data: Shivam excels in data analytics using Power BI, SQL, Splunk, and Python (Pandas, NumPy). He creates dashboards, automates data processing, and enables data-driven decision-making.
skills.backend: Shivam develops Python-based backend API frameworks using FastAPI, creates reusable endpoints, and has experience migrating applications from Windows to cloud-native environments.

experience: Shivam has been working as a Systems Associate since November 2022. He develops Python backend APIs, creates Power BI dashboards, automates data processing, and deploys Splunk monitoring systems for enterprise clients.

In his current role, Shivam focuses on backend API development with Python, cloud migration projects, Power BI analytics, and Splunk monitoring. He's recognized for delivering high-quality work before deadlines.
education: Shivam holds a Master of Computer Applications from Chandigarh University (2024) and a Bachelor of Computer Applications from SOA University (2022). He's currently pursuing an Executive MBA in Data Analytics & Data Science from IIT Patna (expected 2027).
Shivam has strong academic credentials with an MCA and BCA, and he's enhancing his expertise with an Executive MBA from IIT Patna focusing on Data Analytics and Data Science.
certifications: Shivam holds 5 professional certifications: Microsoft PL-300 (Power BI Data Analyst), DP-900 (Azure Data Fundamentals), AI-900 (Azure AI Fundamentals), AZ-900 (Azure Fundamentals), and Google Cloud Digital Leader.
Shivam is certified in Power BI, Azure (3 certifications), and Google Cloud, demonstrating his expertise in data analytics and cloud technologies.

projects.general: Shivam has worked on several impressive projects including a Power BI Analytics Dashboard, Python API Framework, and Splunk Monitoring System. Which project would you like to know more about?
projects.powerbi: The Power BI Analytics Dashboard is an interactive business intelligence solution that transforms raw data into insightful visual reports for monitoring KPIs and operational trends. Built using Power BI, SQL, and Python.
projects.api: The Python API Framework is a backend solution with reusable endpoints, migrated from Windows to cloud-native environments using Python, FastAPI, Azure, and Docker. It improves efficiency and follows modern development practices.
projects.splunk: The Splunk Monitoring System is a real-time log monitoring and alerting solution for enterprise cloud migration. It reduces MTTR and enables faster decision-making using Splunk and Azure.

achievements: Shivam has received the Infosys Rise Insta Award for his contributions in backend API development and data analytics. He's also received 2 formal appreciation mails from management for delivering accurate, high-quality work before deadlines.
Shivam's achievements include formal recognition through awards and appreciation for exceptional performance, proving his ability to deliver high-quality solutions consistently.
